Key Match Events: Doncic chose to go one-on-one against Peyton Watson with just over a minute left and missed a deep 3-pointer, allowing the Nuggets to capitalize and secure a thrilling victory.
Post-Match Reflections: Fans criticized Doncic for taking the deep shot instead of running the offense through Kyrie Irving, who was on fire in the fourth quarter.
Doncic and Irving combined for an impressive 67 points, but the Mavericks struggled to close out the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kyrie Irving delivered an outstanding performance, shooting 17 of 22 from the field and 6 of 8 from 3-point range, finishing with 43 points, five rebounds, five assists, one steal, and one block.
